script.name: plugin.planets.produce
script.sourceplaintext:
$this.sector = $a.dock -> get sector
if not $a.dock -> trades with ware $a.product $a.dock ->add product to factory or dock: $a.product end $a.dock ->change ware to product: ware=$a.product
* Waiting to add some products? if $a.production['waiting'] $production.count = $a.production['waiting'] $free.space = $a.dock -> get free amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay if $free.space >= $production.count = $a.dock -> add $production.count units of $a.product remove key 'waiting' from table $a.production else = $a.dock -> add $free.space units of $a.product $production.count = $production.count - $free.space $a.production['waiting'] = $production.count end
* check for production complete else if $a.production['started'] $start.time = $a.production['started'] $production.time = $a.production['time'] skip if $production.time $production.time = $a.data['time']
$a.production['percent'] = $percent $production.time = fixed multiply and divide: $production.time * 100 / $a.rate $a.production['prod.time'] = $production.time $a.production['prod.rate'] = $a.rate $current.time = playing time $remaining.time = $production.time - ( $current.time - $start.time ) if ( $start.time + $production.time ) <= $current.time
if $a.consumption $a.production['last.consume'] = $current.time else $production.count = $a.production['count'] skip if $production.count $production.count = $a.data['count'] @ $production.count = [THIS] -> call script plugin.planets.utils : type='getProdCount' Value1=$this.sector Value 2=$production.count $free.space = $a.dock -> get free amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay if $free.space >= $production.count = $a.dock -> add $production.count units of $a.product else = $a.dock -> add $free.space units of $a.product $production.count = $production.count - $free.space $a.production['waiting'] = $production.count end end remove key 'started' from table $a.production remove key 'percent' from table $a.production else $time.done = $current.time - $start.time $percent = fixed multiply and divide: $time.done * 100 / $production.time $a.production['percent'] = $percent end
* not started yet, start production else * cant start if there is not enough resources if $a.dock -> exists $production.time = $a.production['time'] skip if $production.time $production.time = $a.data['time'] $production.time = fixed multiply and divide: $production.time * 100 / $a.rate
if $a.consumption $production.count = $a.production['count'] skip if $production.count $production.count = $a.data['count'] @ $production.count = [THIS] -> call script plugin.planets.utils : type='getProdCount' Value1=$this.sector Value 2=$production.count $got.amt = $a.dock -> get true amount of ware $a.product in cargo bay if $got.amt >= $production.count $amt = - $production.count if $a.dock -> add $amt units of $a.product @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.planets.utils : type='incProsperity' Value1=$this.sector Value 2=null $current.time = playing time $a.production['started'] = $current.time $a.production['percent'] = 0 $a.production['prod.rate'] = $a.rate $a.production['prod.time'] = $production.time end end else $tResources = $a.data['resources'] do if $a.raw $tResources = null if $tResources $got.all.wares = [TRUE] $key = get next key: table=$tResources key=null while $key $amt = $tResources[$key] @ $amt = [THIS] -> call script plugin.planets.utils : type='getProdCount' Value1=$this.sector Value 2=$amt if not $a.dock -> trades with ware $key $a.dock ->add product to factory or dock: $key end $a.dock ->change ware to resource: ware=$key $got.amt = $a.dock -> get true amount of ware $key in cargo bay if $got.amt < $amt $got.all.wares = [FALSE] end $key = get next key: table=$tResources key=$key end
if $got.all.wares $key = get next key: table=$tResources key=null while $key $amt = $tResources[$key] $amt = - $amt = $a.dock -> add $amt units of $key $key = get next key: table=$tResources key=$key end $current.time = playing time $a.production['started'] = $current.time $a.production['percent'] = 0 $a.production['prod.time'] = $production.time $a.production['prod.rate'] = $a.rate end
* no resources, start production else $current.time = playing time $a.production['started'] = $current.time $a.production['percent'] = 0 $a.production['prod.rate'] = $a.rate $a.production['prod.time'] = $production.time end end end
end
return null

line.text: add product to factory or dock:

comment.var: cant start if there is not enough resources

line.text: add product to factory or dock:

sval.val: cant start if there is not enough resources
